text: The Skirmish at Adam's Bluff was a Battle that was fought between the Union army and the Confederate army in Jefferson County, Arkansas, on June 30, 1862. The result of the Battle is inconclusive. ==References== Adam's Adam's Category:1862 in the American Civil War Category:1862 in Arkansas Category:June 1862 events Category:Jefferson County, Arkansas
title: Skirmish at Adam's Bluff
